aiPluginUtterances.utterance: Please provide list of all the cases assigned to owner.

GenAiPlugin.description: Handles requests for listing all new cases assigned to a specific owner.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Ask the user to provide the specific owner's name or ID.
If no new cases are found, inform the user accordingly.
If the owner ID is not provided, ask if the user would like to search by name.
When listing the open cases assigned to provided owner, include the case ID, case number, status, priority, and a brief description of each case.

Provide the result with the first line as: 'Here are the cases.' Then, generate the final list in a table format where: 1- The table has properly aligned rows and columns. 2- Column names are in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS for clarity.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to list all new cases assigned to a specific owner. Do not attempt to handle other types of inquiries or actions.
